body:
Comment 4: 
Please try running

cd $GOROOT
hg revert src/pkg/net  # will undo your change
hg pull
hg update
cd src
./all.bash

and see if that fixes the problem.  I believe that we
solved this problem by disabling the test (and fixing
that crash) yesterday, and that your client is out of date.

But I am not 100% sure.

Thanks.
_Status changed to **WaitingForReply**._
